sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_DISPLAY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ||'-'|| F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_DISPLAY_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , F.LAT , F.LNG , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM067', F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , M.LOC , M.EQPMN_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F M WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'M'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND M.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'
ORDER BY F.GIS_ASSETS_CD DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F M WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD(+) AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'M'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND M.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'

SELECT F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE2 , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_NM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_NM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , TO_CHAR(F.LA_CRDNT) LA_CRDNT , TO_CHAR(F.LO_CRDNT) LO_CRDNT , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , M.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO_NM , M.MECH_FCLTS_SE , M.LOC , M.EQPMN_NM , M.EQPMN_NO , M.OPER_CMPNY , M.MFC_CMPNY , M.MFC_AMT , M.INSTL_YRMT , M.MFC_CHK_USR , M.OUT_REACH , M.BACK_REACH , M.REFLOAT_HT , M.PROCESS_ABLTY , M.DRIVE_WD , M.RAIL_WD , M.SELF_LOAD , M.WHEEL_WGHT , M.EQPMN_STNDRD , M.LINK_BRIDGE , M.RUBBER_FENDER , M.ELCTY_MTHD , M.CAPA_TON , M.CONTR_USR , M.CONTR_AMT , M.VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD , M.CLNG_SRC , M.HTNG_SRC , M.WATER_TANK , M.OIL_SAVE_TANK , M.SPICTANK_FMT , M.RM , M.MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = M.MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD) MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F , MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F M WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_NO(+) AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , MECH_FCLTS_SE , LOC , EQPMN_NM , EQPMN_NO , OPER_CMPNY , MFC_CMPNY , MFC_AMT , INSTL_YRMT , MFC_CHK_USR , OUT_REACH , BACK_REACH , REFLOAT_HT , PROCESS_ABLTY , DRIVE_WD , RAIL_WD , SELF_LOAD , WHEEL_WGHT , EQPMN_STNDRD , LINK_BRIDGE , RUBBER_FENDER , ELCTY_MTHD , CAPA_TON , CONTR_USR , CONTR_AMT , VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD , CLNG_SRC , HTNG_SRC , WATER_TANK , OIL_SAVE_TANK , SPICTANK_FMT , RM , MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# || #gisAssetsCd# || #gisAssetsSubCd# || #gisPrtFcltyCd# || #gisPrtFcltySeq# || #prtFcltySe# , #archFcltsMngNo# , #mechFcltsSe# , #loc# , #eqpmnNm# , #eqpmnNo# , #operCmpny# , #mfcCmpny# , TO_NUMBER(#mfcAmt#) , #instlYrmt# , #mfcChkUsr# , TO_NUMBER(#outReach#) , TO_NUMBER(#backReach#) , TO_NUMBER(#refloatHt#) , #processAblty# , TO_NUMBER(#driveWd#) , TO_NUMBER(#railWd#) , TO_NUMBER(#selfLoad#) , #wheelWght# , TO_NUMBER(#eqpmnStndrd#) , TO_NUMBER(#linkBridge#) , TO_NUMBER(#rubberFender#) , #elctyMthd# , TO_NUMBER(#capaTon#) , #contrUsr# , TO_NUMBER(#contrAmt#) , #vntltnArcndtMthd# , #clngSrc# , #htngSrc# , TO_NUMBER(#waterTank#) , TO_NUMBER(#oilSaveTank#) , #spictankFmt# , #rm# , #mechFcltsClCd# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F SET ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO = #archFcltsMngNo# , MECH_FCLTS_SE = #mechFcltsSe# , LOC = #loc# , EQPMN_NM = #eqpmnNm# , EQPMN_NO = #eqpmnNo# , OPER_CMPNY = #operCmpny# , MFC_CMPNY = #mfcCmpny# , MFC_AMT = TO_NUMBER(#mfcAmt#) , INSTL_YRMT = #instlYrmt# , MFC_CHK_USR = #mfcChkUsr# , OUT_REACH = TO_NUMBER(#outReach#) , BACK_REACH = TO_NUMBER(#backReach#) , REFLOAT_HT = TO_NUMBER(#refloatHt#) , PROCESS_ABLTY = #processAblty# , DRIVE_WD = TO_NUMBER(#driveWd#) , RAIL_WD = TO_NUMBER(#railWd#) , SELF_LOAD = TO_NUMBER(#selfLoad#) , WHEEL_WGHT = #wheelWght# , EQPMN_STNDRD = TO_NUMBER(#eqpmnStndrd#) , LINK_BRIDGE = TO_NUMBER(#linkBridge#) , RUBBER_FENDER = TO_NUMBER(#rubberFender#) , ELCTY_MTHD = #elctyMthd# , CAPA_TON = TO_NUMBER(#capaTon#) , CONTR_USR = #contrUsr# , CONTR_AMT = TO_NUMBER(#contrAmt#) , VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD = #vntltnArcndtMthd# , CLNG_SRC = #clngSrc# , HTNG_SRC = #htngSrc# , WATER_TANK = TO_NUMBER(#waterTank#) , OIL_SAVE_TANK = TO_NUMBER(#oilSaveTank#) , SPICTANK_FMT = #spictankFmt# , RM = #rm# , MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD = #mechFcltsClCd# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(ATCH_FILE_SE) ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(ATCH_FILE_SEQ),0) + 1) FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
INSERT INTO FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngNo# , TO_NUMBER(#maxAtchFileSeq#) , #atchFileSe# , #atchFileSj# , #atchFileNmLogic# , #atchFileNmPhysicl# , TO_DATE(#atchFileWritngDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F SET ATCH_FILE_SE = #atchFileSe# , ATCH_FILE_SJ = #atchFileSj# , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC = #atchFileNmLogic# , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL = #atchFileNmPhysicl# , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT = TO_DATE(#atchFileWritngDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
